bibl.title: P. Bodmer II (P66): Three Fragments Identified. Avec résumé en anglais.
bibl.note: P. Bodmer II (= van Haelst 426). - Identifies the fragments 9, 8 and 3 (on plate 151). The identification has significance for the textual criticism of John.
bibl.seg: HEAD Peter M., P. Bodmer II (P66): Three Fragments Identified. Avec résumé en anglais.
P. Bodmer II (= van Haelst 426). - Identifies the fragments 9, 8 and 3 (on plate 151). The identification has significance for the textual criticism of John.
